descriptions.12Ridvan: Celebration of the twelfth day of Riḍván, which marks the end of the twelve-day period in which Bahá’u’lláh declared His mission as the Promised One of the last days.
descriptions.1Ridvan: Celebration of the first day of Riḍván, which marks the beginning of the Festival of Riḍván.
descriptions.9Ridvan: Celebration of the ninth day of Riḍván, which commemorates the arrival of Bahá’u’lláh in the city of Baghdad.
descriptions.ascensionA: Commemoration of the ascension of ‘Abdu’l-Bahá, the son of Bahá’u’lláh.
descriptions.ascensionB: Commemoration of the ascension of Bahá’u’lláh, the founder of the Bahá'í Faith.
descriptions.birthB: Celebration of the birth of Bahá’u’lláh, the founder of the Bahá'í Faith.
descriptions.birthBab: Celebration of the birth of the Báb, the precursor of Bahá’u’lláh.
descriptions.covenant: Commemoration of the Covenant of Bahá’u’lláh, which establishes the succession of leadership in the Bahá'í Faith.
descriptions.declarationBab: Commemoration of the declaration of the Báb as the Messenger of God.
descriptions.martyrdomBab: Commemoration of the martyrdom of the Báb.
descriptions.nawruz: Celebration of Naw-Rúz, the Bahá'í New Year.
descriptions.1fast: First day of the period of fasting in the Bahá'í Faith.
descriptions.19fast: Last day of the period of fasting in the Bahá'í Faith.
descriptions.ayyamiha: Intercalary days in the Bahá'í calendar.

descriptions.0: Intercalary days in the Bahá'í calendar.
